attributes.action: Apologise for the 1919 Amritsar Jallianwala Bhag massacre
attributes.additional_details: It has been over 100 years and the British government has failed to provide an apology for this atrocity.  Thousands of Indians have been asking for an apology for decades and it is important the British government respond and apologise for the cruelty and recognise the injustice.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should formally recognise and issue an apology to India for the massacre of innocent children, women and men.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599802
